room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by GetOut Games in Salt Lake City
review: We were visiting Utah from California and were looking for something fun to do to escape the heat - why not do an escape room? We had so much fun in The Heist and Colin was awesome. Thanks so much for a good time; we would definite recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by GetOut Games in Salt Lake City
review: Had a blast tonight in the Heist room. It was really fun and the staff was great!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by GetOut Games in Salt Lake City
review: Excellent Escape Room! Clever, creative, original puzzles. Tons of fun. Didn't over crowd the room with more players than it could handle. We did The Heist room and will be coming back again.
